definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Place the double layered tempered safety glass door on top of the enclosure.
sentences.chinese: 把雙層鋼化安全玻璃門安放在水箱頂。

sentences.english: He was upside down in a tank of water with chains and lodes all around the lank .
sentences.chinese: 他倒立在一個水箱中，水箱外都盤着鎖鏈。

sentences.english: He was upside down in a tank of water with chains and lodes all around the lank .
sentences.chinese: 他倒立在一個水箱中，水箱外都盤着鎖鏈。

sentences.english: One more thing it does is overflows when you fill the tank to the top.
sentences.chinese: 還有一個作用是在水箱灌滿之後溢流。

sentences.english: Inside the domes are tanks filled with water.
sentences.chinese: 園頂內是裝滿了水的大水箱。

sentences.english: Three fine streams of hot water spouted from holes in the radiator .
sentences.chinese: 三小股熱水從水箱外殼的洞裏湧出來。

sentences.english: Lamp, Bumper, Mirror, Hood, Fender, Frame of water tank.
sentences.chinese: 大燈，保險槓，倒車鏡，機蓋，葉子板，水箱框架。

sentences.english: The hot water heat exchanger respectively connects to tap water pipe and heat insulating water tank.
sentences.chinese: 該熱水換熱器分別與自來水管和保溫水箱連接。

sentences.english: An expansion tank has a chamber in which air is locked inside a bladder or diaphragm.
sentences.chinese: 一個膨脹水箱，空氣中有一個是膀胱或隔膜內鎖定室。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a heat radiator tube laying device for a water tank of a vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型涉及一種汽車水箱散熱器布管裝置。

sentences.english: Water ring vacuum pump in the waste water and air into the tank together.
sentences.chinese: 水環式真空泵中廢棄的水和空氣一起被排到水箱裏。

sentences.english: The purified water then descends by gravity to a basement holding tank.
sentences.chinese: 經過淨化的水靠重力流到地下室的另一個集水箱裏。

sentences.english: I walked to the storeroom, hung the weight on the toilet chain .
sentences.chinese: 我走進堆房，把秤砣掛在水箱鏈條上。

sentences.english: It has stainless steel temperature- holder box , it is very convince to purify.
sentences.chinese: 水式冰水機備有不鏽鋼保溫水箱，清洗方便。

sentences.english: Large discharging outlet frecovery tank, easy to clean.
sentences.chinese: 超大排污口，設計合理，水箱清洗方便。

sentences.english: A return pipe is arranged between the reclaimed water tank and the water-air pump.
sentences.chinese: 中水箱與水氣兩用泵之間設有回水管。
